original_text: “Lord,” he said, “if I have found favor in your eyes, then let the Lord go with us. Although this is a stiff-necked people, forgive our wickedness and our sin, and take us as your inheritance.”
korean_text: 이르되 주여 내가 주께 은총을 입었거든 원하건대 주는 우리와 동행하옵소서 이는 목이 뻣뻣한 백성이니이다 우리의 악과 죄를 사하시고 우리를 주의 기업으로 삼으소서

sentences.original_text: if I have found favor in your eyes
then let the Lord go with us
Although this is a stiff-necked people
forgive our wickedness and our sin
and take us as your inheritance
